recipes.name: Homemade Pasta with Tomato Sauce and Ground Chicken
instructions: Make fresh pasta using 2 eggs and 2 cups of flour.
Cook the pasta and set it aside.
Sauté 1 lb of ground chicken until cooked.
Add 1 cup each of diced carrots and potatoes, cook until vegetables are tender.
Pour in 2 cups of pasta sauce and let it simmer.
Serve the sauce over the cooked pasta.

recipes.name: Creamy Chicken Alfredo Pasta
instructions: Cook 8 oz of pasta according to package instructions.
In a pan, cook 1 lb of ground chicken until browned.
Add 1 cup of 35% cream and simmer until it thickens.
Season with salt and pepper.
Toss the cooked pasta in the creamy chicken sauce.

recipes.name: Sweet Pancakes
instructions: Make a simple pancake batter using 2 eggs, 2 cups of flour, 1/2 cup of water, and 2 tbsp of sugar.
Cook pancakes on a griddle or pan.
Top with ketchup for a savory twist or make a sweet sauce using sugar and water.

recipes.name: Vegetable Omelette
instructions: Beat 3 eggs and season with salt and pepper.
Sauté 1/2 cup each of diced carrots and potatoes, along with any other preferred veggies.
Pour beaten eggs over the veggies and cook until the omelette sets.

recipes.name: Homemade Bread
instructions: Make a basic bread dough using 4 cups of flour, 1 1/2 cups of water, 2 tsp of yeast, and 1 tbsp of sugar.
Let the dough rise, shape it into a loaf, and bake until golden brown.
Serve slices with butter or use it for sandwiches.
